scheme_name: Assistance to Disabled Persons for Purchase/Fitting of Aids/Appliances (ADIP Scheme)
aid_description: Provides financial assistance for purchasing and fitting aids and appliances to improve mobility and daily functioning for persons with disabilities.
locomotor_aid:
Prosthetic and orthotic devices
tricycles, wheelchairs, crutches walking sticks and walking, frames/rolators
surgical footwears and MCR chappals, 
All types of devices for ADL (activity of daily living).
visual_aid:
Braille learning tools (frames, abacus, Braille dots, CD/Tape player)
Talking balances, thermometers, measuring tools
Braillers, shorthand machines, typewriters, talking calculators
Braille attachments for telephones (deaf-blind)
Magnifiers, speech synthesizers, Braille attachments for computers
Adapted walkers (for mobility issues)
Specialized software for visually impaired (approval required)
hearing_aid:
Hearing_aids
Educational kits like tape recorders / CD players, etc
Assistive and alarming devices including devices for hearing of telephone, TV, doorbell, time alarm etc.
Communication aids, like, portable speech synthesizer etc.
mental_aid: Any suitable device as advised by Rehabilitation Professional or treating physician.

scheme_name: National Fellowship for Persons with Disabilities
aid_description: Provides financial support to disabled students for higher education, including tuition, living, and other related costs.
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment (Government of India)

aid_description: Provides health insurance coverage for persons with disabilities for medical treatments, hospitalization, and surgery-related expenses.
scheme_under:
Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities (DEPwD), 
Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of India
locomotor_aid: Coverage for treatments related to locomotor disabilities
visual_aid: Coverage for treatments related to visual disabilities
hearing_aid: Coverage for treatments related to hearing disabilities
mental_aid: Coverage for mental health-related treatments and therapies

aid_description: Provides financial support to students with disabilities for pursuing higher education, including tuition fees, course materials, and other educational expenses.
scheme_under:
Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, 
Government of India
locomotor_aid: financial assistance for aids like prosthetics, wheelchair, etc
visual_aid: for students with visual impairments, assistance in the form of talking books, braille, etc.
mental_aid: financial aid for individuals with mental disabilities, depending on the specific needs like therapy, learning aids, etc.

scheme_name: DISHA (Early Intervention and School Readiness Scheme)
aid_description: Provides financial and educational support for early intervention in children with disabilities. Covers costs for specialized education, therapy, and school readiness.
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
mental_aid: includes therapies, special education, and counseling for mental disabilities

aid_description: Provides day care services, rehabilitation support, and other services for people with disabilities.
scheme_under:
Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment (MoSJ&E), 
Government of India
mental_aid: Psychological support, Counseling, Cognitive therapies, et

aid_description: Monthly pension to persons with severe disabilities to help with daily living costs
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment (Government of India)
locomotor_aid: Support for purchasing mobility aids such as wheelchairs, crutches, prosthetic limbs, and other devices
visual_aid: Financial help to acquire aids such as glasses, magnifiers, or electronic devices designed to assist individuals
hearing_aid: Provision of financial assistance to obtain hearing aids or other auditory devices
mental_aid: Support for individuals with mental disabilities, which may include funding for therapy, counseling, special education.

scheme_name: Free Education Scheme for Disabled Students
aid_description: Provides free education and financial assistance for school and college expenses for students with disabilities
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment (Government of India)
locomotor_aid: No direct aid, but promotes accessibility in education for students with mobility challenges
visual_aid: Includes accessible materials like Braille books, large-print books, and assistive devices for visually impaired students
hearing_aid: Provides assistive devices or accommodations like interpreters for hearing-impaired students
mental_aid: Covers education and support for students with intellectual and developmental disabilities, including special education needs

aid_description: Financial assistance for medical treatment, surgeries, and personal welfare expenses for disabled individuals
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment (Government of India)
locomotor_aid: Devices like wheelchairs, crutches, artificial limbs, and other mobility aids
visual_aid: The purchase of aids such as glasses, magnifiers, talking books, or electronic devices
hearing_aid: Assistance for individuals with mental disabilities, which may include funding for therapies, counseling, and specialized equipment
mental_aid: Support for medical treatments or therapies for individuals with intellectual or developmental disabilities

aid_description: Financial assistance for purchasing assistive technology devices such as adaptive computers, screen readers, hearing aids, mobility aids, etc.
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment (Government of India)
locomotor_aid: Covers expenses for wheelchairs, prosthetics, and other mobility aids
visual_aid: Includes screen readers, magnifiers, and other devices for visually impaired individuals
hearing_aid: Provides financial assistance for hearing aids, cochlear implants, and related technology
mental_aid: Supports assistive devices and technologies for individuals with developmental and intellectual disabilities

aid_description: Provides loans at subsidized interest rates to persons with disabilities for starting small businesses or enterprises
scheme_under: Department of Social Justice and Special Assistance, Government of Maharashtra
locomotor_aid: devices that assist with movement and mobility, such as wheelchairs, walking aids, and prosthetic limbs.
visual_aid: Loans for devices to improve vision, including glasses, magnifiers, and electronic aids for visually impaired individuals.
hearing_aid: Assistance for acquiring hearing aids or other devices that enhance auditory capabilities for individuals with hearing impairments.
mental_aid: Support for tools and therapies aimed at assisting individuals with mental disabilities, including treatments, counseling, and specialized equipment.

aid_description: Provides financial assistance for skill development, vocational training, rehabilitation, assistive devices, and support services
scheme_under: Department of Social Justice and Special Assistance, Government of Maharashtra
locomotor_aid: Includes mobility aids, prosthetics, and skill-based training support
visual_aid: Screen readers, Braille materials, and training for visually impaired individuals
hearing_aid: Hearing devices, sign language training, and communication support
mental_aid: Psychological counseling, cognitive training, and mental health support programs

scheme_name: Gujarat State Medical Assistance for Disabled
aid_description: Provision of prosthetic aids and appliances to individuals with disabilities to enhance mobility and daily functioning
scheme_under: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of Gujarat
locomotor_aid: Provision of prosthetic limbs, wheelchairs, crutches, and other mobility aids
visual_aid: Distribution of assistive devices such as Braille kits, magnifiers, and screen reading software
hearing_aid: The scheme offers various types of hearing aids, including Behind-The-Ear (BTE) models, to cater to different levels of hearing loss.
mental_aid: Focus is primarily on physical aids and appliances

scheme_name: Central Sector Scheme of National Handicapped Finance and Development Corporation (NHFDC)
aid_description: Provides loans for persons with disabilities for business and self-employment.
scheme_under: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment

scheme_name: Subsidy Scheme for Assistive Devices for Persons with Disabilities
aid_description: Provides subsidies for purchasing assistive devices like hearing aids, wheelchairs, prosthetics, etc.

scheme_name: Vocational Training for Persons with Disabilities (VTPD)
aid_description: Provides vocational training for persons with disabilities to improve employability.

scheme_name: Special Education And Vocational Training Through Government Institutions
aid_description: Special Education is provided to children with disability between the age group of 6 to 18 years in the Government Special Schools and Vocational Training is provided to special children above the age of 18 years
scheme_under: Department of Social Justice & Special Assistance
